mapper.select: select username,fullname,password,u.brchno,`lock`,brchna from sys_user u, branch b where b.brchno = u.brchno and username = #{username}
select username,fullname,password,u.brchno,`lock`,brchna from sys_user u, branch b where b.brchno = u.brchno order by brchno,username
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (username, fullname, password,brchno, `lock`) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brchno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lock,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update sys_user set fullname=#{fullname}, password=#{password}, brchno=#{brchno}, `lock`=#{lock,jdbcType=BIT} where username=#{username}
